description: Learn The Voyage of the Beagle in one minute.

hook.text: In 1831, a 22-year-old boarded a ship as an unpaid naturalist. His name was Charles Darwin.

buildup.text: The Beagle's five-year voyage took Darwin around South America, the Pacific, and the Indian Ocean.
